Plot: Southern sludge lords RWAKE carve a circle in the earth and summon powerful spirits and earth shattering riffs from within it at Maryland Deathfest X. Fifty minutes of musical exorcism that will cleanse your dirty soul.
Title: A Stone, a Leaf, an Unfound Door: Rwake Live at Maryland Deathfest
Writer: David Hall, Jeff Morgan, Christopher Terry
Actors: Brittany Fugate, Kris Graves, John Judkins, Jeff Morgan
